物品-非传统药水: 涂抹此药剂的刀刃将在两周内无法割伤血肉 A blade coated with this will cut no flesh for a fortnight
每只眼睛滴一滴可治愈近视，但你会变成色盲 A drop in each eye cures near-sightedness, but you're now colorblind

一种特殊的灯油，能在红外视觉光谱中明亮燃烧。哥布林对此深恶痛绝。 A special kind of lamp oil. It burns brightly in the Infravision spectrum. Goblins hate it
加入你的血液，喂给一只魔宠。现在它也与你有契约联系，而它的主人却毫不知情。 Add your blood, feed to a familiar. It's bonded to you too now and its Master is none the wiser
所有投射物在一天内都会偏离目标。不幸的是，它们将在一周后同时精准命中。 All projectiles fly wide for a full day. Sadly, they'll strike true all at once in a week
反香水：完全无味，能掩盖其他任何气味 Anti-Perfume: No smell whatsoever, masks any others
任何饮下此药水的孩童将获得3级魔法使用者等级 Any child drinking these gains 3 levels of Magic-User
任何饮下此药水的精灵将在一年内无法说谎 Any Elf who drinks this cannot lie for a year
将箭头浸入此药水后，箭矢将变得完全无声 Arrowheads dipped in this make the arrows utterly silent
蛇怪唾液：将说谎的舌头化为石头 Basilisk Spit: Turns lying tongues to stone
沐浴添加剂：一周内免疫污秽 Bath additive: Immune to filth for a week
瓶装呼吸：保存临终遗言。可重复三次 Bottled breath: saves dying words. Can repeat thrice
呼吸能够熄灭火焰，但不包括龙焰 Breath can extinguish fires, up to but not including dragon fire
能将黄金转化为铅 Can transmute gold to lead
天界鞋油使低阶亡灵跪地舔靴 Celestial shoe-polish causes lesser Undead to grovel and bootlick
将此药水涂抹于盗贼鞋底，便可在一周内追踪其足迹 Coat a Thief's soles with this and you will see their tracks for a week
恭喜你获得了全新的蹼状手脚 Congratulations on your new webbed hands and feet
不断翻腾。加入液体后，立即沸腾 Constantly roiling. Added to a liquid, instant boiling
含有一种对土元素位面原住民致命的、无法治愈的疾病 Contains a virulent, incurable disease to natives of the Plane of Earth
柔术师之友：骨骼随心所欲地变为胶状，持续12小时 Contortionist's friend: Bones become jellied at will for 12 hours
受石像鬼与魔像觊觎，一滴便可驱使它们效劳 Coveted by Golems & Gargoyles, will serve for a sip
一位鲜为人知圣徒的骨灰：功能相当于十份圣水 Cremains of a lesser-known Saint: function as Holy Water x 10
治愈木乃伊腐化，却引发普通感冒 Cures Mummy Rot, inflicts the common cold
返老还童20年，效果持续1周 De-age 20 years, lasts 1 week
死亡十分钟，期间化为怨魂，每被吸取一个等级便延长一天一夜 Die for 10 minutes. Become a Wraith in interim, every level drained adds a day and night
滴落在地面，会生成流沙 Dribbled on earth, generates quicksand
饮用者梦见自己遗失或错放物品的位置 Drinker dreams location of something they lost/misplaced
树精之泪：涂抹在木制品上，使其坚如钢铁 Dryad Tears: Coat a wooden item and it's tough as steel
四只活水蛭。吞下一只，即可止住任何出血。 Four live leeches. Eat one, stop any and all bleeding
从日出到日落，将法师的嘴巴牢牢粘住 Glues a Wizard's mouths shut from sunrise to sunset
在一小时左右内长出坚固的冰爪和冰牙 Grow durable ice talons and fangs for an hour or so
内含一只性情多变的小型水怪 Home to a tiny, temperamental, Water Weird
蹄蜡：使马匹速度翻倍持续一周，同时增加饲料和水的摄入量 Hoof wax: doubles a Horse's speed for a week, also fodder/water intake
若与一瓶葡萄酒共饮，所有饮者可在酒瓶见底前无需言语进行交谈 If shared in a bottle of wine, all drinking can converse without speaking until bottle is empty
若用于船只下水，此船将永不因风暴而沉没 If used to launch a ship, the vessel will never sink via storm
若能让龙饮下此药，其鳞色将在一小时内发生变化 If you can get a dragon to drink it, they change color for an hour
立即且永久地将两件金属物品焊接在一起 Immediately and permanently weld two metal items together
墨水转化剂：用此物冲洗卷轴，可发现一个同等级的新法术。 Ink Transmuter: Rinse a Scroll with this and find a new spell same level
驱虫剂，对大型生物效果相反 Insect repellant, works opposite on the big ones
速成炖汤：只需加水，一勺可喂饱五人 Instant Stew: Just add water, 1 spoon feeds five
瞬间长出引人注目的胡须 Instantaneous and impressive beard growth
立即污染一片水域，最大可达湖泊规模 Instantly fouls body of water, up to lake size

通过泼洒使一件烧毁的物品恢复完整 Make whole one burnt object by dousing
腌制腐蛆：食尸鬼王的珍馐美味 Marinating Rot Grubs: A Ghoul King delicacy

摩登血：驱赶小鬼，修复小型损坏的机械装置 Modron Blood: Drives away Gremlins, fixes small broken mechanical devices

盐水中的蚊子幼虫（d12）。喂食一滴血，可获得一只忠诚的刺针怪 Mosquito Larvae in brackish water (d12). Feed one blood and gain loyal Stirge
对着它低语一个秘密，现在只有你一人知晓 Murmur a secret into it, you're the only one who knows it now
蚁兵之乳：喂给婴儿，他们将成长为强大的战士 Myrmidon Milk: Fed to a baby, they will grow to be mighty warrior
一颗豆子。若种下，会长出种植者的复制体。听从命令，一日内凋零 One Bean. If planted, sprouts double of planter. Follows orders, withers in day
一滴足以让矮人醉倒 One drop is enough to get a Dwarf drunk

愤怒灵药，激起刻薄与敌意 Philter of Anger, incites acrimony and enmity
陶泥浆：用于上釉或装饰，陶瓷从此永不破碎 Pottery slip: used to glaze/decorate, the ceramic never breaks

倒在镜子上，可见最后一位被其映照之人 Pour on a mirror, see last person who it reflected
倒在祭坛上：该信仰的牧师一天内无法接收祈祷 Pour on altar: No clerics of this faith can receive prayers for a day
倒在手或手套上：握手魅惑他人 Pour on hands/gloves: Handshake Charm Person
浇在植物上：瞬间成熟 Poured on a plant: instantly grows to maturity

银粉悬浮液：狼人症预防剂 Powdered silver suspension: Lycanthropy prophylaxis
与空气反应，生成100立方英尺的浓密绿色雾气 Reacts with air, creating dense green fog 100 cubic feet
使不孕者恢复生育能力，使他人失去生育能力或变得不育 Renders infertile fertile, others impotent/barren
边缘结霜：加入液体后，瞬间冻结 Rimmed with frost: added to liquid, instantly freezes
水手之友：捕捉狂风，持续一日 Sailor's Friend: Captured gale blows for a day
瓶中船。砸碎即可召唤一艘单桅帆船 Ship in a bottle. Smash for instant sloop
皮肤变绿，能够进行光合作用。 Skin turns green. You can photosynthesize
用于睡眠法术及其更强变种的嗅盐 Smelling salts for Sleep spells and stronger variants
烟雾魔宠。厌恶被饮用，但喝下后你将免疫烟雾影响。 Smoke Mephit. Hates being drunk, but you’re immune to smoke when you do
直到饮用其他饮品前，能够以惊人的距离和精准无误地吐口水。 Spit with unerring accuracy/ impressive distance, until you drink something
凝视一只带羽飞禽，它便会从天空坠落 Stare at a feathered flier, they will fall from the sky
塞着塞子的塞壬之歌。缺少一只耳塞 Stoppered Siren-Song. Missing one ear plug
用一种恐惧替代另一种恐惧 Substitutes one phobia for another

对小于你头颅的物体施展心灵遥控 Telekinesis for objects smaller than your skull
烈酒调温剂：饮用后不会醉酒或宿醉 Temper strong drink: no inebriation or hangover
瓶中之宝：当需要时，它会自动跃入手中 The vial is the treasure here: It leaps to hand when needed
浓稠如蜜的物质：对巫妖一族极具诱惑力 Thick, honey like substance: Insanely desirable to Lichkind
这种酸液仅对玻璃或宝石有效 This acid only works on glass/gems
以此酒祝餐，饮用期间无人可被下毒 Toast a meal with this libation, no one can be poisoned for duration

独角兽信息素 Unicorn pheromones
万能去污剂，对灵魂亦有效 Universal stain remover, works on souls
用于磨砺斧头，砍伐活树树干和木材如切黄油般轻松 Used to hone axes, cuts living tree trunks and wood like butter
吸血鬼防晒霜 Vampire Sunblock

无论倒在哪里，下一次风暴时闪电都会击中此处 Wherever poured, lightning will strike during next storm
向小瓶低语后封口。开启时：大声喊出信息 Whisper into vial, stopper. When opened: Yells Message
你可以与火焰交谈。虽显稚嫩，但它知晓自己焚烧过什么/如何燃起。 You can converse with fire. Puerile but knows what it's burnt/how it started
你现在可以毫无问题地食用和消化石头，化石尤其美味。 You can now eat/digest stone without issue. Fossils are tasty
你专属的黑布丁，半可驯养 Your own, personal, Black Pudding. Semi-trainable
